Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: O Goyaa! Do not narrate the circumstances of Lailaa to any deranged mind,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Because, I become insane just after listening to the tale of Majnoo. It is just apt for an insane (for Guru's love) like me. (21) (5)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਸ ਬਹੁ ਮੁਲੱੀ ਆਯੂ ਦਾ ਨਫ਼ਾ ਉਸ ਨੇ ਪਰਾਪਤ ਕਰ ਲਿਆ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Addressing the Guru: People prostrate eighteen thousand times with their faces towards You

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And they circumambulate all the times the street of Your Kaabaa, the sacred place. (22) (1)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਮੇਰੇ ਵੀ ਦੀਵਾਨੇ ਦਿਲ ਨੂੰ ਏਹੀ ਸੁਦਾ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Wherever they see, they see your (the Guru's) elegance and radiance,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਦ ਦੀ ਉਸ ਦੇ ਸੁੰਦਰ ਕੱਦ ਨੇ ਸਾਡੀਆਣ ਅੱਖਾਣ ਵਿਚ ਥਾਣ ਬਣਾਈ ਹੈ,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: O Knower of the innermost feelings of their hearts! They see a glimpse of your face. (22) (2)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤਦ ਤੋਣ ਉਸ ਤੁਰਦੇ ਫਿਰਦੇ ਸਰੂ ਤੋਣ ਸਿਵਾਇ ਸਾਡੀਆਣ ਅੱਖਾਣ ਵਿਚ ਕੋਈ ਹੋਰ ਨਹੀਣ ਜਚਦਾ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: They, the people, have sacrificed their lives for your handsome personality and grand stature,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਲੈਲਾ ਦੀ ਊਠਣੀ ਦੇ ਗਲ ਪਈ ਟੱਲੀ ਦੀ ਆਵਾਜ਼ ਸੁਣ ਕੇ ਮੇਰਾ ਦਿਲ ਸ਼ੋਦਾਈ ਹੋ ਗਿਆ ।

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, with your redolence, they can revive the courage in (morally and physically) dead minds. (22) (3)

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: O Guru! Your face is the mirror through which they can get Lord's glimpse,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, they do get His glimpse through the mirror of your face. Even the Garden of heaven is envious of this. (22) (4)

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The corrupt-minded-peolple who do not have the proper vision,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: take the liberty of putting the sun in front of your elegant face. (22) (5)

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: In their exuberance for their love for your affection, they sacrifice thousands of the worlds.

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: In fact, they sacrifice hundreds of lives just for one lock of your hair. (22) (6)

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When people talk of the notoriety and fame of your face,

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Then, in the garb of your refulgence, the whole world gets illuminated and fragrance floats around. (22) (7)
